messages.help: I have a lot of commands!
messages.commandDisabled: aww, looks like this command is turned off :/
messages.cooldownStrike: *huff*, one second; I need a breather. Give me %s!
messages.generalException: Ow... I hit my head there >_< - sorry about that, the command just crashed. if you can please send this to my dad: `%s`
messages.commandProcessException: OOF, that hurt >_< - it looks like something broke before I could even launch the command, please tell my dad this for me: `%s`

deleteMessages: telling Rylan this is a Jojo reference
